story:
Story of My Book

Tethered Souls is about Gabe, a vampire who has been under the control of his maker for over 200 years, and longs for his freedom. Amber, his soulmate, is the key to his freedom, though she doesn’t know that. If his maker, Vance, finds out that Amber is Gabe’s soulmate reincarnate, Vance will stop at nothing to intercept their fiery reunification. It’s up to Gabe to keep her safe and convince her to unite with him. Because they're meant to be…aren’t they?

My name is Jill Laing and I am the author of Tethered Souls: A Vampire Novel. I wrote this book to entertain and recognize that through the development of my characters and plot, various themes have emerged offering new perspectives to the reader around control, life after death, and female empowerment.

My hope is that in reading this book you will discover characters that are relatable and powerful. I want you to see this book as an opportunity to escape from reality and get lost in a world where both Gabe and Amber try to gain control of their lives and deal with the fear of losing it entirely. 

Set in the Hollywood scene, Gabe returns from a hiatus in Mexico and finds himself hanging out at Antonio’s mansion amongst the who’s who in the region…again. As he sits at the bar, attempting to tune out various conversations around the mansion, he begins to sweat. Feeling feverish. But vampires don’t get sick. Walking out into the crisp open garden, a very distinct voice amidst the crowd comes into focus. 

Her! 


Gabe’s soul urges him back into the lounge only to find Amber cornered by Marco, her former lover. Not uncommon for cast and crew in Hollywood to hook up, but Gabe would make certain that Marco would not interfere with his plan to unite with Amber. 

As the story unfolds, Amber’s undoubtedly drawn to Gabe, this intoxicating stranger. Even with her instincts on high alert to the danger he radiates, she’s not afraid. There’s something behind those dark eyes as if he’s reaching into her soul. But is she ready for this level of commitment?

Gabe pulls Amber into his world but in doing so he risks putting her life on the line, again, to reach his goal to freedom. All she has to do is agree to becoming a vampire to complete the ceremony. Uniting should be a simple task since he has the power of magic on his side this time.

You will love this book if you are longing for a new love connection, if you are in love with falling in love, if you are curious about the meaning of life, or you’re eager to see how each character’s path has a twisted connection to the end goal.

Tethered Souls speaks to paranormal romance readers and adults drawn to the intimacy of a vampire’s bite. Ultimately, I hope that Tethered Souls inspires enjoyment, but also reflection and fruitful dialogue around choice, freedom, and control. I look forward to exploring these topics and beyond with my readers. I believe discussing these themes will change us all for the better. 

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
 

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in August, 2021.
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this summer.

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover and an audiobook.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
 

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Author’s Note and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more!

 

About the Author

J.H. Laing writes paranormal romance with a touch of suspense. A lover of people and avid daydreamer, she melds her imagination and connection to human emotions into her stories. Once a teacher of English to international students in Florida and New York City, she figuratively traveled the world in her classrooms, learning the students’ cultures and customs. When The Twilight Saga made it into her hands, she was riveted. In an interview, author Stephenie Meyer said her story came to her in a dream, and that is when Laing realized that she needed to write the stories she had been creating since childhood. She will release her first book, Tethered Souls, A Vampire Novel in August.


International Preorders

For international preorders, please send me a private message.


Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier. 

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.


Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
 

  • Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #TetheredSouls and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page.
  • Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

In peace,

Jill

story:
Story of My Book

Beyond Carbon Neutral is a book about solving climate change. It goes through, step-by-step, what we need to do right now to avert the crisis.

My name is Samuel Goodman and I am the author of Beyond Carbon Neutral. I wrote this book because I wanted to prove there is a solution to this monumental problem and understand what the implications of that solution mean for not only the future of energy, but for society as a whole.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you’ll discover that there is still hope for solving climate change. In this book, I hope to both instill in you the passion and clarity that I have for tackling such a major problem. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you gain the understanding you need to advocate for the future you want to build, free of a looming catastrophe.

In this book, you'll learn about building a carbon-free power grid with the tools we have right now, reversing damage to the climate by taking carbon out of the atmosphere, and changing societal institutions to make those achievements happen. You'll hear about things like:

Making intermittent renewables like solar and wind provide constant energy year-round;

Rebuilding our forests and oceans to permanently store carbon dioxide;

Ways to use the powers of business and government to make change happen;

How you can get involved and make choices that make a difference.

You will love this book if you are concerned about the future because of climate change, want to know how to fix it, and want to know what you can do about it.

Beyond Carbon Neutral is a nonfiction book that speaks to everyone concerned about climate change. It’s designed to give someone the information they’ll need, whether they’re just entering the topic or a veteran looking for new insights and a concrete plan.
 

The Book - Beyond Carbon Neutral


The book is written in 5 parts.

Part 1 contains the introduction and chapter 1. This section lays the groundwork for the rest of the book. The introduction presents the stakes we’re dealing with and the failure to respond to that challenge. In chapter 1, the book defines how we’re going to approach solving this problem by defining the terms of our climate strategy.

Part 2 contains chapters 2-8. This part of the book is all about how to re-build our power grid using renewable energy sources. Critically, it details how to solve the problem of making all these different sources of energy work together without the need for any fossil fuels.

Part 3 contains chapters 9-12. These chapters discuss the other half of mitigating climate change—pulling carbon out of the atmosphere. The reader will be walked through the different options available, and be able to decide which ones actually make sense for permanently reversing the damage that’s been done.

Part 4 contains chapters 13-16. The final four chapters discuss how we can implement the changes we need using the institutions available to us in society. This part lays out the role that business, government, and you, the reader, will play in making this effort successful.

Part 5 pulls together everything discussed in the book and presents it as a coherent strategy for solving climate change with timelines and deliverables we can follow to solve this problem.

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in April 2021.
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this April 2021.


When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.


I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more!

 

About the Author

Samuel M. Goodman is currently a chemicals industry analyst with the U.S. International Trade Commission. He was formerly a AAAS Science and Technology Policy Fellow placed at the U.S. Department of Defense and a post-doctoral fellow at the National Academy of Sciences. Samuel received his doctorate from the University of Colorado at Boulder and his bachelor’s from the University of Wisconsin Madison, both in chemical engineering.

Dr. Goodman has always been interested in addressing climate change, but was increasingly frustrated with a scientific, social, and political environment where nothing seemed to be happening and no one had complete and workable solutions. He hopes that this book helps move the conversation forward in a meaningful way and provide readers with a blueprint for action by drilling down to workable and necessary solutions.

When he’s not working and writing about serious topics, Dr. Goodman likes writing about silly topics, watching terrible movies, studying history, and doing minor home improvement projects. He lives in northern Virginia with his wife, Ashley, where they enjoy cooking and spending time outside together.

For more information, you can connect with Dr. Goodman on LinkedIn at /samuel-m-goodman, drsamuelgoodman@gmail.com, and on Twitter @GoodestSam.
 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #BeyondCarbonNeutral and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so that we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my pre-sale campaign via Indiegogo at the top of the page.

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Sam Goodman

story:
Please donate to help me write my book! Thanks for watching my video! 


Our ultimate choice, FEAR (Body) vs. LOVE (Spirit) – learn how to awaken to your Divine potential! This work is my mission in life! I see how we experience trauma, fear, stuck emotions – and how we can be in harmony. Meridians (Body and Emotions) intersect via specific points, with Chakras (Satellites of the Soul); when healthy, these anchor into our Divine spark, the Core Star of the CS Matrix system (which includes Chakras and what I call Core Star Matrix Lines, which are at the deepest level. They stabilize the Chakras, and each have a specific function – when strong, a 3rd eye upgrade occurs). This is what I've consistently seen in thousands of sessions! 


My Background...

This project is many years – if not life times in the making. My work as a Licensed Counselor, Advanced practitioner of Energy Medicine, and Intuitive, has been an amazing journey of discovery. I "see" trauma, how energy flows, and the stories embedded within the energy systems... the ability and breadth of which I was not initially aware I even had! Time is of the essence!!! I leave Savannah in May to move to NYC. My goal: I will raise funds to write my book, this Autumn (once my daughter graduates from high school and enters college!). 

I'll share how these Energy systems interact; teaching the exercises (I have 3 laminates, but there are more!). Feel more centered and able to not take on others' pain; learn how we're all wired for the Divine. 

My book's title: Core Star Matrix Healing...

I am seeing new information: a new interface of the Core Star, plus easy exercises that Spirit showed me, which complement any approach you've ever used. I will provide tools to access each layer; and to understand how trauma affects you now – and how you can heal in body, mind and Spirit. See my website for more info, www.ellenfarrell.com

I am not getting any younger folks! With my father's passing last December I knew it was time for me to speed up the meeting of my contract – my life's work. As I sat with this, having seen him in and out of his body, at the portal, and after, I contemplated why I am here (on Earth). I quit my day job, and am devoting myself to what matters – Love, Family, and the work.

Time to get busy! I wrote an outline and did the research... it's time to share what I know. I hope you will find my vision meaningful – and will help me gain the resources, to get the ball rolling to write the book! 

Here's the Deal... 

Publicists, publishing, shipping costs, and just living, plus 2 kids in college and one about to enter - boy costs add up quickly. Seeing clients non-stop, I find it impossible to write. Living and not having to worry about having money for my next meal will be a huge help. Pricing: I've found ranges from 2 thousand to 8K for publishing alone. A secondary goal is to record an audio version of the book which will entail recording studio fees. PR plus fees for equipment to get the word out now is a critical aspect of my goal. I don't know if I will find a publisher! I haven't even looked yet, but I know that Balboa press is an option – and I've always felt it's in God's hands, and will find its way. My plan: help a new generation of healers (and those who want to be healed – and stay healthy) to have access to how these Energy systems connect. 

 Why a Book?...

We're talking about the ultimate aligning of body and soul - spirit infused into form. What connects us is LOVE. Until we feel it we will continue endlessly acting out dramas of fear and reactivity, and habits of survival. But we are Angels on Earth, here to learn about love, and being our best – when we understand what we're made of, I believe, and HAVE SEEN, that we feel better; more present, aware, happy, empowered... and we do better.

I know it can get confusing to read conflicting information online, and all I can say is the seers of old are being quoted, and at times mis-quoted – and that the information and systems themselves, like us, are evolving. I can only report what I see (and feel, sense, hear, etc.), and that my clients agree it is correct. 

It's been reaffirming to hear my clients support – and their questions and desire for a book (and meditation CD's, DVD's, maybe another book about Past Lives, and my experiences with healing Immune system issues, etc.) to reference all we have done – and also it's been a supreme blessing to see their growth. 

One of my favorite sayings is "If of thy store 2 loaves of bread alone remain, sell one, and with the dole, buy hyacinths to feed thy soul."                                                            

I will use whatever funds I get toward this goal. If I meet or exceed my goal I pay 4% – if I do not meet my goal, I pay 9% to Indiegogo, so obviously, I hope to exceed my goal! Most important is that the knowledge is shared!

If you have any extra "dole", please help me fund my vision of sharing the gift of this work to help us awaken, evolve, transcend fear, and heal – so you will be able "to feed your soul" ...and all souls, and the planet, will benefit.

Please help me to keep moving forward... contribute, and share this campaign with friends and family in Facebook, Twitter, and email! Share a lot, and fear not!!! Listen to your inner voice, and please use the Indiegogo share tools!!! If you have any questions, please email me, ellen@ellenfarrell.com, or message me on Facebook! I have only a few spots for clients left - call and we can schedule you for right after St. Patty's day!

 How Ellen's work evolved... 

As a child my mom had to deal with my consistent curiosity (Sorry Mom!) – and they said I was always saying "Why?" about just about everything. Also, although for many years I assumed everyone was the same as me, I knew/ "saw" past lives, knew what others were thinking (well - they'd say it soon after I internally heard it/clair-audient), and often had information, that I had no way of knowing... it would just come out of my mouth! I joke that I am a Spirit savant. I am also empathic, kinesthetic (I feel other's feelings and emotions, and life, deeply), and am dyslexic - this means that I see in pictures from many angles, and I also experience life in a very multi-sensory way, even as synesthesia.      

I was never bored, spoke with Nature, animals, bees. Life was a beautiful, magical place for me as a child. Since I can remember, I've been fascinated with why and how we respond to life, life beyond this life, how we experience trauma (emotional pain), how we heal, and learning about what really matters, LOVE. I read about many cultures, was fascinated with Edgar Cayce, played classical guitar, and acted in, and directed many high school plays!

I began my young adult life with the study of Acting at Rutgers University in their BFA program. I became more curious about the psyche, and was intrigued with the drama of BEING, what being healthy, and healing means –  understanding why we think what we do, and where these thoughts and feelings originate. There while practicing Alexander Technique, and just walking with a friend, I had a major past life memory of being guillotined. This shocking experience made me very curious, once again. Later, I met my husband in a lecture on healing at a channeler's loft in the Village of NYC, and in 1987, I studied Reiki which is basically opening up to healing energy in Chakras, and feels like "good vibes" – and it's the science of passing down this knowledge. As I first began to put hands on clients, I found I got information that was very personal about why they had physical pain, blocks or any discomfort at the emotional level as well. Reiki felt great, but did not cure my health issues. I later found out why – and I learned how to listen well, and shift the pain into a healing release, creating harmony on all levels. Many years later, 2008, I trained with Brian Weiss in Past Life Regression.

I'm a mom of 3, married to my best friend and husband of 27 years. I know how life can throw you for a loop, and have had my own share of trauma (haven't we all?). Yes, the answer is, 100% of humans have experienced trauma! I had therapy, but it did not clear the deepest signals of trauma (beyond this life), and I experienced immune system dysfunction as a young adult, which first showed up as chronic fatigue. I felt like there was a toxin in my body that I didn't know how to remove. There was, and I later found out about how trauma affects the body with leaky gut syndrome, and exactly how that feels. It's a precursor to Lupus, Fibromyalgia, MS, and a host of other diagnoses.     

                            

In the '90's living in Los Angeles, I found a Dr. of Chinese Medicine, and my husband and I were able to conceive after 5 years of no success (and trying conventional methods of fertility specialists). Later, a homeopath, MD, acupuncturist named Dr. Luc DeSchepper helped me clear the Candida, and create a healthy gut. Going through that process, I re-experienced traumas and began to heal. I still had many hurdles ahead of me at the time. I worked in the health food industry, so had access to cutting edge nutrition and supplement information, and I read every book on immune system~healing I could find. For several years, I also was an improv actor in grant-funded  programs in schools – helping children to feel empowered and address trauma issues. From those years, a calling to learn more about psychology grew. For 8 years my dream was on the back burner, as I learned a wealth of information, worked hard in the Nutrition industry – and we raised our young children. In '98, we moved to Savannah to be near family, my daughter entered pre-K, and I "synchronistically" found a program that led me to being a licensed psychotherapist. It was time.

The upshot: jump to 25 years later. When my daughter entered Pre-K in 1999, I entered a graduate program! I became a Licensed Therapist (2001), and then added certified Reiki Master, Yoga teacher, EMDR, and Advanced Energy Medicine practitioner and past life Regression therapist (I studied early on, briefly, with Caroline Myss, and later with a Cherokee Medicine man in Taos NM; Dr. Brian Weiss at the Omega Institute ('08), and Donna Eden~Innersource EM Advanced work, and was a work scholar for 6 years at NICABM annual conferences to 2011). Chinese Medicine (means Meridians: what acupuncturists work with; the 5 Elements; and Radiant Circuits – these reflect organ health, and access emotional health in the body). Ayurvedic tradition discusses 'Chakras' (or Soul Stories: how we orient to Spirituality, intuition, communication, Love, truth & integrity, being a creator & creating, Earth connection – within ourselves and with others). 

      

I found that as I worked with my clients, I saw more specifically into these Energy Systems, and the "emotional splatter" left by "emotional splinters" in what I came to see as the "containment fields" of the Chakras. The new system emerged, that I came to call "Core star Matrix Healing" which shows a  3-point connection (in what I call the Spirit Dan Tiens), between these ancient healing systems from China and India. I found my clients healed quicker and more thoroughly from issues that other cognitive talk therapies for many years had not cleared. I discovered in partnership with Spirit, many exercises that turned out to help my clients. I used them and found them helpful too, but if my clients hadn't validated the findings, it would've been without merit. I'm a skeptic at heart, who also happens to have found out I am highly intuitive, and kinesthetic. I want the world at large to know how trauma, and this deeper Energy system works (and how it leads to a strong foundation and upgrade for the 3rd eye), from someone who has been there and healed. 

Here I am, April, 2012, at the 5th Biennial Cultural Competency Conference at GA State University, where I was chosen to present a Poster session: Awakening to the Energies that unite us…   a new culture of Oneness. Deepak Chopra was their Keynote speaker.

Reiki, Yoga & Meditation, breath work  Affirmations/Positive thinking – all of these things are good, important, and helpful. None of them give us full access to directly and thoroughly reach/heal the original wound. If the signal is still there we are not functioning at our full potential. Cognitive therapy, EMDR/EFT, kinesiology, even Regression may – or may not get to the deepest layers of trauma (I do these modalities). But it does not teach you how to work with your own energies to stay strong, and clear. Also, the tricky thing about trauma is that it's hidden in the subconscious. If we don't ask the best questions, we don't get the best answers.

This kind of information used to be taught in secret societies... we don't have time for that now. We need to wake up. Control, greed, and fear are trauma responses that are leading to destruction of our Heaven on Earth potential. I teach how to access the deepest layers of your own energy systems so we can thrive, and reverse damage that has been done. You still may need a skilled clinician/practitioner for support especially with chronic/severe issues, but either way, you will have access to a deeper template of healing that will change you for the better – it will empower you, and help you take a fast track to evolve your Soul! 

Thank-you, and many blessings of health, love, peace, wisdom, and joy to you and yours.  Love, Ellen


I've completed 2 books of poetry both about 70 pp. each (Stories from my Heart ...Spirit-infused Wisdom Poetry, and Pregnant Poems ...for families of all kinds), and am working on editing the 3rd, Merging with the Divine, a more personal and larger compilation. I will be formatting the first book this summer, and it will be ready for you by the Autumn 2014, as an ebook. 

References for the book: 

“A wonderful collection. For someone who is as incapable of writing poetry as I am of drawing or painting, it is a privilege to read and sense the beautiful artistry in Stories of My Heart. There are themes for every heart!”                    – Norm  Shealy, President, Holos Institutes of Health, Professor Emeritus of Energy Medicine, President Emeritus, Holos University

Ellen "may well become one of my all-time favorite poets." – Rosemary Daniell, acclaimed author, poet, teacher

“Ellen is an amazing Seer!” – Donna Eden, author Energy Medicine, EM pioneer, mentor. 

An excerpt, from "Stories..." is below. This book is in 4 parts, this poem, from Spirit Wisdom. Chapters also include: Earth Wisdom, Inner Wisdom, and Heart Connection. 

Leap of Faith

Take another baby step 
up the ladder of enlightenment.
How many circles must be traversed
before finding peace?

Close your eyes,
and let the love in your heart
flood your being.
Let your cells fill, and expand,
and luxuriate in it.

You’re ready to take a stand –
to do your bit;
to take another baby step,
or maybe even a leap or two;
to FLY with wings wide,  
and faith strong.

Listen for your guidance.
You’ll know when.
Maybe
NOW,
you
are
ready.

  


The Perks: 

I find that when most folks hear the truth, it resonates with them. Know that your financial support is a testament to your belief in this work – and that you are a profound motivator for me! 

Get the ball rolling level $3 USD, or more.    Anything you contribute is appreciated! I am deeply grateful for your support. At the $3 level, it’s a big help if you will share this campaign with your friends and family in Facebook, Twitter, and via email! 

Cherub level - $25 USD. At this level you have my eternal gratitude for your belief in the work - and your name will be placed in the acknowledgments section of my book, Core Star Matrix Healing (CSMH) ...unless you tell me otherwise.

Bless Your Heart level - $50 USD or more. Get all the above - plus you will get an ebook of Stories from my Heart, Spirit-infused wisdom poetry, and a signed hard back pre-published version of the  CSMH book. Your pre-order with a little extra. I will share my progress with you over the year.

Wind beneath my wings level - $250 USD. Also, all of the above, my infinite gratitude, the poetry ebook, the hard-cover signed CSMH book, I will also send you the ebook for your Kindle, Nook, or iPad of the CSMH book. I would love to personally thank-you over Skype, or meet with you for coffee if you are local.

Angel Benefactor... (Thank-you forever) level - $500 USD or more... Again, this could not get done without your support. In addition to the perks above, I very much look forward to thanking you in person, and speaking with you via Skype or to meet for coffee or tea, and I offer to also meet with your group, book club, or other small group.

Do the Work level, 12 max. - $300 USD Intake session - basic evaluation, 1.5 hours. Get your Energy flowing! For those in the Sav'h area or willing to make visits in late March or April! Call when you sign up and schedule your Intake session - more info. is on my site, ellenfarrell.com (see FORMS to print the PDF form - bring it to the session). I've had folks come in from Canada to FL. In 2 day increments we can usually get 2-5 hours done. This can only be assessed on an individual basis. 

Go the Distance level, 7 max. - $1500 USD Pre-req., Intake session. Get 10 hours of work toward completing CSMH... as with the Do the Work level, this is for those in the Savannah area or willing to make visits! Call or email me with questions, and schedule your Intake session - and then we will schedule session hours in 2 hour increments. You will also get both ebooks for your Kindle, Nook, or iPad. 

Thank-you again for your help!!! 

Love & Blessings, Ellen

But we are Angels on Earth, here to learn about love, and being our best – when we understand what we're made of, I believe, and HAVE SEEN, that we feel better; more present, aware, happy, empowered... and we do better.I know it can get confusing to read conflicting information online, and all I can say is the seers of old are being quoted, and at times mis-quoted – and that the information and systems themselves, like us, are evolving. I can only report what I see (and feel, sense, hear, etc.), and that my clients agree it is correct. It's been reaffirming to hear my clients support – and their questions and desire for a book (and meditation CD's, DVD's, maybe another book about Past Lives, and my experiences with healing Immune system issues, etc.) to reference all we have done – and also it's been a supreme blessing to see their growth. One of my favorite sayings is "If of thy store 2 loaves of bread alone remain, sell one, and with the dole, buy hyacinths to feed thy soul."                                                            I will use whatever funds I get toward this goal. If I meet or exceed my goal I pay 4% – if I do not meet my goal, I pay 9% to Indiegogo, so obviously, I hope to exceed my goal! Most important is that the knowledge is shared!If you have any extra "dole", please help me fund my vision of sharing the gift of this work to help us awaken, evolve, transcend fear, and heal – so you will be able "to feed your soul" ...and all souls, and the planet, will benefit.Please help me to keep moving forward... contribute, and share this campaign with friends and family in Facebook, Twitter, and email! Share a lot, and fear not!!! Listen to your inner voice, and please use the Indiegogo share tools!!! If you have any questions, please email me, ellen@ellenfarrell.com, or message me on Facebook! I have only a few spots for clients left - call and we can schedule you for right after St. Patty's day!
 How Ellen's work evolved... 

As a child my mom had to deal with my consistent curiosity (Sorry Mom!) – and they said I was always saying "Why?" about just about everything. Also, although for many years I assumed everyone was the same as me, I knew/ "saw" past lives, knew what others were thinking (well - they'd say it soon after I internally heard it/clair-audient), and often had information, that I had no way of knowing... it would just come out of my mouth! I joke that I am a Spirit savant. I am also empathic, kinesthetic (I feel other's feelings and emotions, and life, deeply), and am dyslexic - this means that I see in pictures from many angles, and I also experience life in a very multi-sensory way, even as synesthesia.      I was never bored, spoke with Nature, animals, bees. Life was a beautiful, magical place for me as a child. Since I can remember, I've been fascinated with why and how we respond to life, life beyond this life, how we experience trauma (emotional pain), how we heal, and learning about what really matters, LOVE. I read about many cultures, was fascinated with Edgar Cayce, played classical guitar, and acted in, and directed many high school plays!I began my young adult life with the study of Acting at Rutgers University in their BFA program. I became more curious about the psyche, and was intrigued with the drama of BEING, what being healthy, and healing means –  understanding why we think what we do, and where these thoughts and feelings originate. There while practicing Alexander Technique, and just walking with a friend, I had a major past life memory of being guillotined. This shocking experience made me very curious, once again. Later, I met my husband in a lecture on healing at a channeler's loft in the Village of NYC, and in 1987, I studied Reiki which is basically opening up to healing energy in Chakras, and feels like "good vibes" – and it's the science of passing down this knowledge. As I first began to put hands on clients, I found I got information that was very personal about why they had physical pain, blocks or any discomfort at the emotional level as well. Reiki felt great, but did not cure my health issues. I later found out why – and I learned how to listen well, and shift the pain into a healing release, creating harmony on all levels. Many years later, 2008, I trained with Brian Weiss in Past Life Regression.I'm a mom of 3, married to my best friend and husband of 27 years. I know how life can throw you for a loop, and have had my own share of trauma (haven't we all?). Yes, the answer is, 100% of humans have experienced trauma! I had therapy, but it did not clear the deepest signals of trauma (beyond this life), and I experienced immune system dysfunction as a young adult, which first showed up as chronic fatigue. I felt like there was a toxin in my body that I didn't know how to remove. There was, and I later found out about how trauma affects the body with leaky gut syndrome, and exactly how that feels. It's a precursor to Lupus, Fibromyalgia, MS, and a host of other diagnoses.                                 In the '90's living in Los Angeles, I found a Dr. of Chinese Medicine, and my husband and I were able to conceive after 5 years of no success (and trying conventional methods of fertility specialists). Later, a homeopath, MD, acupuncturist named Dr. Luc DeSchepper helped me clear the Candida, and create a healthy gut. Going through that process, I re-experienced traumas and began to heal. I still had many hurdles ahead of me at the time. I worked in the health food industry, so had access to cutting edge nutrition and supplement information, and I read every book on immune system~healing I could find. For several years, I also was an improv actor in grant-funded  programs in schools – helping children to feel empowered and address trauma issues. From those years, a calling to learn more about psychology grew. For 8 years my dream was on the back burner, as I learned a wealth of information, worked hard in the Nutrition industry – and we raised our young children. In '98, we moved to Savannah to be near family, my daughter entered pre-K, and I "synchronistically" found a program that led me to being a licensed psychotherapist. It was time.
The upshot: jump to 25 years later. When my daughter entered Pre-K in 1999, I entered a graduate program! I became a Licensed Therapist (2001), and then added certified Reiki Master, Yoga teacher, EMDR, and Advanced Energy Medicine practitioner and past life Regression therapist (I studied early on, briefly, with Caroline Myss, and later with a Cherokee Medicine man in Taos NM; Dr. Brian Weiss at the Omega Institute ('08), and Donna Eden~Innersource EM Advanced work, and was a work scholar for 6 years at NICABM annual conferences to 2011). Chinese Medicine (means Meridians: what acupuncturists work with; the 5 Elements; and Radiant Circuits – these reflect organ health, and access emotional health in the body). Ayurvedic tradition discusses 'Chakras' (or Soul Stories: how we orient to Spirituality, intuition, communication, Love, truth & integrity, being a creator & creating, Earth connection – within ourselves and with others).       
I found that as I worked with my clients, I saw more specifically into these Energy Systems, and the "emotional splatter" left by "emotional splinters" in what I came to see as the "containment fields" of the Chakras. The new system emerged, that I came to call "Core star Matrix Healing" which shows a  3-point connection (in what I call the Spirit Dan Tiens), between these ancient healing systems from China and India. I found my clients healed quicker and more thoroughly from issues that other cognitive talk therapies for many years had not cleared. I discovered in partnership with Spirit, many exercises that turned out to help my clients. I used them and found them helpful too, but if my clients hadn't validated the findings, it would've been without merit. I'm a skeptic at heart, who also happens to have found out I am highly intuitive, and kinesthetic. I want the world at large to know how trauma, and this deeper Energy system works (and how it leads to a strong foundation and upgrade for the 3rd eye), from someone who has been there and healed. 
Here I am, April, 2012, at the 5th Biennial Cultural Competency Conference at GA State University, where I was chosen to present a Poster session: Awakening to the Energies that unite us…   a new
culture of Oneness. Deepak Chopra was their Keynote speaker.Reiki, Yoga & Meditation, breath work  Affirmations/Positive thinking – all of these things are good, important, and helpful. None of them give us full access to directly and thoroughly reach/heal the original wound. If the signal is still there we are not functioning at our full potential. Cognitive therapy, EMDR/EFT, kinesiology, even Regression may – or may not get to the deepest layers of trauma (I do these modalities). But it does not teach you how to work with your own energies to stay strong, and clear. Also, the tricky thing about trauma is that it's hidden in the subconscious. If we don't ask the best questions, we don't get the best answers.This kind of information used to be taught in secret societies... we don't have time for that now. We need to wake up. Control, greed, and fear are trauma responses that are leading to destruction of our Heaven on Earth potential. I teach how to access the deepest layers of your own energy systems so we can thrive, and reverse damage that has been done. You still may need a skilled clinician/practitioner for support especially with chronic/severe issues, but either way, you will have access to a deeper template of healing that will change you for the better – it will empower you, and help you take a fast track to evolve your Soul! Thank-you, and many blessings of health, love, peace, wisdom, and joy to you and yours.  Love, EllenI've completed 2 books of poetry both about 70 pp. each (Stories from my Heart ...Spirit-infused Wisdom Poetry, and Pregnant Poems ...for families of all kinds), and am working on editing the 3rd, Merging with the Divine, a more personal and larger compilation. I will be formatting the first book this summer, and it will be ready for you by the Autumn 2014, as an ebook. References for the book: “A wonderful collection. For someone who is as incapable of writing poetry as I am of drawing or painting, it is a privilege to read and sense the beautiful artistry in Stories of My Heart. There are themes for every heart!”                    – Norm  Shealy, President, Holos Institutes of Health, Professor Emeritus of Energy Medicine, President Emeritus, Holos UniversityEllen "may well become one of my all-time favorite poets." – Rosemary Daniell, acclaimed author, poet, teacher“Ellen is an amazing Seer!” – Donna Eden, author Energy Medicine, EM pioneer, mentor. An excerpt, from "Stories..." is below. This book is in 4 parts, this poem, from Spirit Wisdom. Chapters also include: Earth Wisdom, Inner Wisdom, and Heart Connection. Leap of FaithTake another baby step up the ladder of enlightenment.How many circles must be traversedbefore finding peace?Close your eyes,and let the love in your heartflood your being.Let your cells fill, and expand,and luxuriate in it.You’re ready to take a stand –to do your bit; to take another baby step,or maybe even a leap or two;to FLY with wings wide,  and faith strong.Listen for your guidance.You’ll know when.MaybeNOW,youareready.  The Perks: I find that when most folks hear the truth, it resonates with them. Know that your financial support is a testament to your belief in this work – and that you are a profound motivator for me! Get the ball rolling level $3 USD, or more.    Anything you contribute is appreciated! I am deeply grateful for your support. At the $3 level, it’s a big help if you will share this campaign with your friends and family in Facebook, Twitter, and via email! Cherub level - $25 USD. At this level you have my eternal gratitude for your belief in the work - and your name will be placed in the acknowledgments section of my book, Core Star Matrix Healing (CSMH) ...unless you tell me otherwise.Bless Your Heart level - $50 USD or more. Get all the above - plus you will get an ebook of Stories from my Heart, Spirit-infused wisdom poetry, and a signed hard back pre-published version of the  CSMH book. Your pre-order with a little extra. I will share my progress with you over the year.Wind beneath my wings level - $250 USD. Also, all of the above, my infinite gratitude, the poetry ebook, the hard-cover signed CSMH book, I will also send you the ebook for your Kindle, Nook, or iPad of the CSMH book. I would love to personally thank-you over Skype, or meet with you for coffee if you are local.Angel Benefactor... (Thank-you forever) level - $500 USD or more... Again, this could not get done without your support. In addition to the perks above, I very much look forward to thanking you in person, and speaking with you via Skype or to meet for coffee or tea, and I offer to also meet with your group, book club, or other small group.Do the Work level, 12 max. - $300 USD Intake session - basic evaluation, 1.5 hours. Get your Energy flowing! For those in the Sav'h area or willing to make visits in late March or April! Call when you sign up and schedule your Intake session - more info. is on my site, ellenfarrell.com (see FORMS to print the PDF form - bring it to the session). I've had folks come in from Canada to FL. In 2 day increments we can usually get 2-5 hours done. This can only be assessed on an individual basis. Go the Distance level, 7 max. - $1500 USD Pre-req., Intake session. Get 10 hours of work toward completing CSMH... as with the Do the Work level, this is for those in the Savannah area or willing to make visits! Call or email me with questions, and schedule your Intake session - and then we will schedule session hours in 2 hour increments. You will also get both ebooks for your Kindle, Nook, or iPad. Thank-you again for your help!!! Love & Blessings, Ellen

story:
What is Mynah?

Mynah is an annual print magazine about Singapore, Singaporeans and Singaporeanness. We aim to critically and creatively examine the facets of this country that either don’t get enough time in mainstream media, or haven't been discussed in broad ways. We do this with word counts that run into the thousands, allowing our stories depth and context.

In our past two issues, we have explored LAN shop culture, Teochew puppetry, bomohs, Singapore soap operas, Traditional Chinese Medicine and more.

**

A spread of "Three Recipes for the Singapore Sling" by Joel Tan

**

What's in Mynah #3?

  • A look at the origins of the Singapore Sling through three different recipes and how it became the bland tourist trap it is today
  • Speculative vignettes of an alternative Singapore where British colonialism never happened
  • An essay on the parallels of Samsui women and modern-day migrant workers, and what they tell us about labour, gender and race
  • An exploration of translation in Singapore that examines 1950s Malayan multilingual films and installation art
  • An analysis of Singlish and the linguistic face of settler colonialism
  • A conversation between Amanda Lee Koe and Jeremy Tiang on translation
  • A gorgeously styled photo essay of customised, or zhnged, instant noodle recipes
  • And more!

We pride ourselves on being a magazine with a diversity of voices, and in Mynah #3 we're proud to feature the work of emerging writers like Natalie Christian Tan and Gregory Ng Yong He, and seasoned contributors like Joel Tan and Nuraliah Norasid, just to name a few.

**

A spread of "Mee Zhng" by various contributors

**

Why Mynah? 

Mynah began because we saw a gap in the publishing landscape where in-depth Singapore stories should’ve been. We wanted to carve out a space where stories could plumb Singapore’s depths and explore the timbres and textures of our country the mainstream media does not cover. We also wanted Mynah to be a space for the architects of these stories—writers, illustrators, photographers and more—to be in conversation with each other.

We’ve published two issues so far to great reception, a validation of our belief that there is a demand for intelligent longform writing about Singapore. We’re big fans of print and with the news cycle going at lightning speed 24/7, we wanted to create a slow reading experience with a magazine you can sit with and return to again and again. This issue contains 10 stories in a ~150-page magazine; the result of a year’s worth of research and writing.

**

A spread of "For Whom My Language Translates" by Syafiqah Jaaffar

**

Where does the money go? 

Mynah is committed to being a non-profit magazine. We also don't receive any money from government grants or advertisers, making our content completely independent. Crowdfunding is the primary way that our publication remains financially viable. Our editors and creative team have donated their time to the publication and no one in the main team is making any money from this. We are also committed to getting all pre-ordered copies printed and delivered to you, regardless of whether we meet our funding goal.

Your money goes firstly toward paying our contributors for their time and labour. We value original, creative work and firmly believe that paying creators is the first step to ensuring that their work continues to exist. We’re still a new magazine and have only been able to offer honorariums to our contributors thus far. That said, we’re happy to say that contributor fees have doubled since our debut. We’re hoping to steadily increase our fees over the years and any additional funds from the crowdfunding campaign will go towards commissioning work for Mynah #4.

The bulk of the money goes toward printing the magazine itself. As print lovers, we’re excited to bring a high quality magazine to our readers. This issue, we’re working again with Allegro Print, a Singaporean company with 20 years of industry experience. We’re upping our production game for this issue: for the first time, we are offering our issue with three separate covers that give different perspectives of a beautiful spread by the artist Divaagar, the entirety of which can be viewed as a spread in the magazine. 

Cover 1:

Front cover

Back cover

Cover 2:

Front cover

Back cover

Cover 3:

Front cover

Back cover

Lastly, the money raised will go towards shipping and handling (scroll down to the section Shipping Information for more on our shipping methods and estimated delivery times), producing and purchasing perks, and Indiegogo platform fees (5% of all fees raised).

Here is a breakdown of estimated costs for Mynah #3:

SGD $3800 – contributors’ fees (writers, artists, illustrators, photographers)

SGD $8500 – printing costs (1,000-copy print run)

SGD $3200  – shipping and handling, Indiegogo platform fees (5% of all fees raised and additional bank transfer fees for fundraising in SGD)

**

A spread of "Alternative Futures" by Nuraliah Norasid

**

What perks do you offer?

Before we get to perks, we should mention that all magazines ordered through Indiegogo are significantly discounted from their retail price, so we encourage you to get a copy sooner rather than later. Indiegogo funders will get first access to brand-new Mynah merchandise with designs we’ve specially commissioned from Singaporean artists.

We’re particularly excited for you to see our 16oz premium canvas tote bags, with a literate!Mynah design by Nicholas Leong. And to make sure no one steals the copies of Mynah within, our totes have magnetic button openings. The totes also have a small interior compartment, where you can stash our metal pins with a design by Joell Ang, and our customised EZ-Link cards designed by former contributor and friend of the magazine Joy Ho.

Mynah tote bag, design by Nicholas Leong

Mynah metal pin, design by Joell Ang

Mynah EZ-Link card, design by Joy Ho

And last but not least, we have multi-magazine bundles! You can enjoy all three covers of Mynah #3 with our collect 'em all pack. Our bundle of both Mynah #2 and #3 is perfect for newcomers who’d like to catch up on what we’ve done previously (unfortunately, Mynah #1 is completely sold out and no longer available for sale). And our bundle with two copies of Mynah #3 will suit you if you just can’t think of a holiday gift for your friends or family: keep one for your own reading pleasure and give the other away to share the love!

Own all the magazines with the Mynah #3 Collect 'Em All Pack!

*If you would like to make a customised order of Mynah #3 and the various perks, do reach out to us at mynahmag@gmail.com and we’ll see what we can do.

How else can I help?

If what we've said strikes a chord with you and you'd like to help out beyond just purchasing copies of the magazine, here are some ways you can do so: 

  • If you're a stockist, distributor or bookstore owner who's interested in stocking Mynah, reach out to us at mynahmag@gmail.com 
  • If you're an educator, programme director or would like to make bulk purchases for your school, company or organisation, let us know at mynahmag@gmail.com 
  • If you like what you see and would like to talk about potentially sponsoring future issues of Mynah, again, mynahmag@gmail.com is the place to go!
  • Know someone who'd love our magazine? Spread the word by sharing our crowdfunding campaign on social media and telling all your friends! 

Shipping Information

Mynah uses the following shipping methods for the following countries:

  • Singapore: SingPost SmartPac (with tracking)
  • Malaysia and Brunei: SingPost airmail
  • United States: USPS media mail
  • The rest of the world: SingPost surface mail

All our shipping prices are calculated according to these rates, which were selected so shipping is as inexpensive as possible. 

Singapore funders can track their pre-orders thanks to the SmartPac shipping method. If you would like to know the progress of your order, please email us at mynahmag@gmail.com. Unfortunately, we can't offer tracking for international backers due to prohibitive cost.

Mynah #3 and perks will be packed and shipped late November 2019. Singapore funders will receive their pre-orders December 2019. International funders will receive their pre-orders between January and February 2019, based on Singpost’s 6-10 week delivery estimate.

story:
Poets Maya Chinchilla, Vickie Vertiz and Lisa Marie Rollins have all been accepted into the nationally known VONA Voices summer Workshop.

“The VONA Voices Workshop is dedicated to nurturing developing writers of color. Held at the University of San Francisco each summer, writers come from around the country and around the globe to work with renowned writers of color.”

http://www.voicesatvona.org/

The tuition for each poet is $500.00. If 150 friends give $10.00 we will be able to meet our goal!

Please support this wonderful opportunity for these poets to create in a setting specifically supporting their work!

story:
CAMPAIGN UPRATE:

A BIG heartfelt Thank You to everyone who contributed to the campaign and helped us reach our initial goal in the first day!

Many of you sent books to male friends; several to prisons. 

The main focus of this campaign going forward is to support as many men as possible in waking up emotionally to create a safer world for all of us. Whether these men are in prison, your life, or in your workplace, please support our goal for the remainder of the campaign to IMPACT at least 2000 men with 2000 books! 

SPREAD THE WORD!

 
* * *

I’m on a mission to inspire my brothers to get our act together. You don’t need to see statistics to know men in all levels of society (bankers to bums) are messing up, whether they realize it or not. They’re acting out in stupid, selfish ways for reasons they often don’t fully understand and making life miserable for themselves and those who try to love them. Men in prison have to risk death, become fully accountable for their actions and responsible for their own healing before starting to live fuller lives.  Men on the outside are imprisoned by emotional immaturity and lack of accountability that dearly cost them and the ones they love. Support our vision of providing one million men in crisis the practical guidance, tools, and inspiration they need so they can prevent and resolve conflict in their homes, workplaces, and communities.

Yes, ladies some of us, and hopefully soon a lot more of us, want to be real men. 

When you ask how he is and a man says “fine”, he really means Frightened, Isolated, Neurotic and Emotionally unavailable. (FINE)

This campaign is for those of us seeking a safer world. We are coming together to co-write a powerful, persuasive book and get it into the hands of men in crisis everywhere. We will Crowd-Author a book and SEND IT TO PRISONS, BOARDROOMS AND CONGRESS, SO MEN WHO NEED IT CAN READ IT. Pledge and send a book to your boss, your buddy, your family member who needs to “Wake Up, Man Up, Step Up.”  The book is described as: “a treasure map (for men) that if followed will lead you to your best self. It will help you see that the journey inside yourself is where the freedom is. Around the world, our communities - our men, women, and children need us to wake-up and step-up.” 

What’s the difference between men and government bonds? Bonds eventually mature. (To be politically correct, there are many mature men, just not enough)

Unfortunately, for many men it takes a crisis like divorce, illness, losing their job or the death of a parent to get them to look inside. It was divorce for me. It woke me up and put me on this path to becoming an Integrative Coach with a law degree and certifications in money coaching, life planning, belief processing, as well as several years of facilitation and leadership training.

When women are depressed, they call a girlfriend. When men are depressed, they call for a war. (And yes, we are aware those are stereotypes)

I’m sure our co-authored book will work if we can get men to use it. They’ll come to understand why they do the things that DON’T WORK for them and learn how to start doing things that DO WORK. Too many men live stuck in unconscious patterns and wind up incarcerated.

  • Help me get the book into the hands of men in prisons before they come back out still confused and angry.
  • Help me get it to those men of power and privilege whose fear comes out as cruelty, corruption, war and winner-take-all callousness.
  • Help yourself and the men in your life by getting this book into their hands!

 

Your stories matter!

Virtually every woman has been emotionally, physically or verbally abused by a man during her life, yet often they haven’t had a chance to speak up. Their stories should be told, and with your help we will include them in the new book. People need to see and feel what’s happening. Men need to understand the damage they’re doing by staying asleep. Almost every man reading this KNOWS or at least senses he could do better. 

You as a man may have been emotionally, physically, or verbally abused and haven't had a chance to speak up. We want to hear from you too.

Pledge, so men get tools for manning up.

How the Money will be Used:

We're raising the money to produce and distribute books that include the stories of those who need to be heard. We’ll spend what’s contributed on:

  • Layout & editing
  • Promotion of the cause
  • Printing
  • Distribution

Wake Up, men! It’s time for us men to stop running away from our responsibility.

Man Up! It’s time to heal ourselves and create peace and prosperity for women and children.  

Step up! I’m asking you, men and women, to share your stories, photos, poetry, art and ideas around the effects men have had on your world and in the lives of your friends, families, and children.

 

now... THE REWARDS:

Pledge $5 or more. 

WITH YOU IN MORE THAN JUST SPIRIT. Stand up and be counted as willing to take a stand against violence in our world. Men commit ninety percent of violent crime, often because they suffered as children and never were taught how to handle their feelings. Let your dollar be a gesture of compassion so boys will learn how to live love.

Pledge $15 or more.

CO-AUTHOR THE NEW BOOK. Nominate your story, photo, poetry or art for inclusion in the CROWD-AUTHORED book. Whether your story is included in the book or not your name will be listed on a special thank you page in the book. Please follow these submission guidelines. 

Pledge $25 or more.

GET THE BOOK FOR SOMEONE WHO REALLY NEEDS A WAKE UP KICK IN THE ASS, LIKE YOUR BOSS, PARTNER, HUSBAND, EX-HUSBAND, BOYFRIEND OR YOURSELF. If you know a man you believe is ready to “Wake Up, Man Up, Step Up” we’ll send the 1st edition anonymously with a note that says “Someone in your life believes in you enough to buy you this book. They know you’re ready to “Wake Up, Man Up, Step Up” in your life and that your world, and theirs, will be better after you do.” (Digital version available)

Pledge $80 or more.

FOR WOMEN: ANSWER YOUR OWN WAKE CALL, STEP UP IN YOUR WOMAN’S POWER AND BECOME AN EFFECTIVE COACH FOR YOUR MAN. Get the 1st edition of the book and a spot for yourself in an ARATAcode two month online video course. Receive coaching from Ray to get your husband or lover to show up in your life in a way you’ve always wanted. If he’s facing his “wake up” call, currently in crisis or you’re having your own wake up and have decided something has to change “or else”, coaching can help. If you’re patient, you don’t try to rescue him (or let him off the hook) and he does his emotional work he might be able to show up in your life in a way you always knew was possible.

Pledge $200 or more.

SET UP YOUR OWN SUPPORT GROUP – A PEACE (AND PIZZA) COMBO. You’ll receive FOUR COPIES of the hardcover 1ST edition of “Wake Up, Man Up, Step Up” as well as a Support Group Starter Kit explaining how to set up your men’s support group.  Give a book to three friends, form a quartet, keep each other accountable and see your lives transformed by using the ARATA code of conduct. You’ll also receive a pizza with the message “I’m for peace and pizza in my world” spelled out in olives, mushrooms or sausage, and delivered to your door to kick off your first meeting. Two additional books will be sent to a prison in your name.

Pledge $250 or more.

SEND HELP TO MEN IN CRISIS, GET ACKNOWLEDGEMENT IN THE BOOK & ON WEB SITE. We’ll use your donation to send 10 books to a prison, rehab center or community program that works with men looking for the tools to learn emotional maturity and a new way of being in the world. You can direct the books to a prison or program of your choice or select from our list. We’ll forward to you any mail we receive from the place we send your books. Your name will be added to the ARATAcode.com website to acknowledge your contribution and you’ll be listed in the book. 

Pledge $850 or more.

THE ADVENTURE SERIES. You might be in your own crisis of sorts. You need something for yourself.  Connect with yourself, others, and nature. Yoga, hiking, kayaking and more will be combined to create a fun adventure in nature during an ARATAcode outdoor experience. The combination of exercise and camaraderie with people present and willing to open into greater Awareness, Responsibility, Accountability, Tenacity, and Acceptance will fill you up with exactly what you need. 

 

Pledge $4,000 or more.

HAVE RAY DELIVER A KEYNOTE AND CONDUCT BREAK OUT SESSIONS AT YOUR ORGANIZATION TO PROMOTE GENDER EQUALITY... You’ll receive a workshop for your business where I will empower participants to examine and own their biases and see the impact they create. I will reframe innovative ways of leadership. I will apply his emotional literacy principles for leadership and diversity so strategic imperatives gain everyone’s participation regardless of gender, race, culture, sexual orientation, or ethnicity. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

There are so many ways you can get involved.

Please click here for other options.

story:
Summary

  • I'm a former drama teacher of children aged 3-18. Throughout my teaching years, I have been inspired and in awe of children's imaginations. It is the hugely creative, optimistic, and open mind's of the youngest children I worked with that have inspired me to write stories for children aged 3-6years. These are the years where children share ideas and thoughts with no inhibitions and no limits. I want to encourage this means of free-thinking through my stories.
  • Although I have been lucky enough to find a fantastic illustrator to work with, I have not been lucky enough to get published. I could never afford to self-publish on my own but I don't want my work to sit on a USB, unread and untouched by the very children that I have written it for. If every one of my friends gave me 50p, I would be well on my way to getting published. I'm openly asking for help because this is a project that I want to see through. Please help me to bring my first book to life!

How You Can Help

  • It is going to cost me between 700-1300 pounds to self-publish my book. Along savings of my own and your help, I hope to make this happen! 
  • Each contributor will get a mention in the credits of my book. 
  • If you contribute over £10, you can claim my perk which will mean that not only are you named in my book, you will also get sent one of the very first to be published copies straight to your address! :) 

The Impact You Will Make 

If you contribute, you will be helping my to accomplish something I have wanted to do since I was at school. I will be forever grateful for your support in what is going one of the most exciting projects of my life so far! 

  • If you have younger children, nieces, nephews, I would love to show them this book, among many others that I have in the pipeline. As a contributor, you would always receive special prices and discounts not just on this book, but on all of my future books that I plan to publish. If you contribute over £10, I will send you a signed copy of my book on publication as well as include your name in the publication! 
  • Although this will be my first publication, my stories have been tried and tested on children for years. As a drama teacher of 3-6 year olds I have had many story-telling sessions with groups of 25 3-6 year olds in one room, all engaging in my original stories. My books would be an excellent platform for children to practice role-play and creative drama as well. 
  • Although I am currently working full-time in education, I would love to be a full-time writer/children's theatre director. I will also be looking to adapt many of my stories into theatre for children. If you can help me in the first stepping stone of this dream, I assure you, your contribution will always be remembered and appreciated and I will try to show this through ensuring that you will always have discounted and exclusive access to any of my future projects. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Are you as broke as me? You can contribute in other ways instead! 

  • Spread the word on social media and by word of mouth about my book and my campaign.
  • Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Wish me luck! :)  
  • Be happy and eat marshmallows.

story:
Story of My Book

SALEM AVENUE is a collection of horror stories that examines the city as a source of horror, focusing on paranoia, isolation, and urban decay. They all exist in the same universe and are united by an alien threat from the other side of the stars.

My name is Joseph Theis and I am the author of SALEM AVENUE. I wrote this book through Georgetown University's Creator Institute, inspired by own experiences living in Washington, DC after witnessing the pain and suffering of the most vulnerable people living on the streets and in struggling neighborhoods. 

I hope that, by reading this book, you will have a new understanding of the city not only as the center of  but also as a place where promises of progress fall through, where those who live above the skyline abandon those who live in their shadows. 

SALEM AVENUE consists of four different stories:

The Black Spot - A man living alone in the city contracts an infection from a mysterious spot of black mold growing in the corner of his apartment. His sense of paranoia grows as he isolates himself against the world.

Salem Avenue - Elba Reed, a high school senior in the town of Hager's Fancy, discovers a terrible power hidden inside herself and shared by a dangerous cult living in the abandoned house on Salem Avenue. 

Necropolis - The city of Los Huesos plays host to an unforeseen outbreak as Michael Foster makes his way on foot from his job downtown back to his home in San Lorenzo.

Forbidden Things - A government compliance officer uncovers more than routine nonconformity during a site visit to Talos Industries. Advances in biotech have relied on a mysterious black mold that threatens to overwhelm the facility and spread out into the world.

You will love this book if you are a fan of horror, or if you are interested in experiencing the city from an entirely new viewpoint! SALEM AVENUE speaks to those who live in the city, and those who do not, and enables everyone to examine the flaws in the leadership of urban communities that have failed their most vulnerable inhabitants. Ultimately, I hope that this book inspires reflection and meaningful dialogue about the abandonment of the homeless and the poor in urban centers. I look forward to engaging in these conversations with my readers, and I know that together we can work toward a more just society for all.

What I Need & What You'll Get

SALEM AVENUE will be published in December 2020 through Georgetown University's Creator Institute and by New Degree Press. This pre-order campaign will help to cover the costs associated with a limited printing and publishing this book. Pre-order sales will go towards the following:

  • An Editor who will help to revise and publish the final version of the manuscript;
  • Final design of the cover;
  • Interior layout design;
  • A Copyeditor who will proofread for grammatical and spelling mistakes;
  • Launch and promotional efforts for the December release of the book.

I am also offering exclusive rewards for everyone who pre-orders the book now, including:

  • A personally signed copy upon release;
  • Your name will be included in an Acknowledgements Section of the book;
  • A handwritten thank-you note for your support;
  • The option to serve as a Beta Reader and receive early access to select chapters and provide feedback that will help in the editing process, as well as the opportunity to be an integral voice in the cover design.

October Pre-Order Bundle

In addition to offering eBook and Signed Paperback editions, I will also be offering an October Pre-Order Bundle similar to a mystery subscription box! 

The October Pre-Order Bundle will include:

  • A signed paperback copy of SALEM AVENUE;
  • A custom Black Spot bookmark;
  • Collectible signed photo prints highlighting moments from each story;
  • Several in-universe documents, including scientific diagrams and a map of Hager's Fancy;
  • And more!

About the Author

I was born and raised in Hagerstown, Maryland. I currently live in Washington, DC where I earned my law degree from the Columbus School of Law. I am an avid reader and a lifelong fan of the horror genre. My favorite horror authors are Poe, Lovecraft, and King.

I wrote this book as a response to my expectations prior to moving to Washington, DC. The city had always seemed a glittering place brimming with potential. When I arrived, I saw the people who live in the shadows of the skyscrapers. The horrors of homelessness and the isolation inherent in urban living served as inspiration for the sort of horror at work in this collection.

Other Ways You Can Help

In addition to contributing to this pre-sale campaign, there are some other ways you can help:

  • Share links to this campaign across social media;
  • Share this campaign page via Indiegogo at the top of the page;
  • Share with friends, family, and anyone else you think might enjoy it!

Thank you so much for all of your support!

Joseph Theis

Hi, we're Viva and Vicky, founders and editors of SheRa Mag. We met through mutual friends in Melbourne over a decade ago and have been close ever since. Viva now lives in LA and is an actress, writer, and producer while Vicky has been working in publishing in London and Istanbul over the past five years. One day last year, Viva called Vicky with an idea: let's start a magazine that explores the many shades of the female experience and champions kick-ass female pioneers of our generation.  Before Viva could even finish, Vicky interrupted her: "V! This has been my dream as well! Lets do it!!"

What is SheRa Mag?

SheRa Mag is an online magazine for girls who think. We publish daily trending stories in culture, fashion, film and TV, music, and world issues pertaining to women. We also publish a themed issue every 2–3 months (past issues have included 'The Sex Issue' and 'The Dream Issue'), which consists of around 13 feature articles, including a fashion editorial. It is this component which sets SheRa Mag apart from most online magazines, and our content from issues remains the highest viewed to date.

www.sheramag.com

SheRa Mag is also a proud and active member of the Its Time 2015 hosting committee – a US national summit designed to elevate female leadership around the world. #ItsTime2015

Why is SheRa Mag raising money?

As we produce a free magazine, we need funding to keep producing relevant editorial content. First and foremost, we want to pay our wonderful, hardworking writers. To this day, everyone, including 20 writers and other creatives (photographers, hair and makeup artists, graphic designers) have contributed for free. But to keep them working for us, we need to compensate them for their efforts. Giving value to ideas, research, and writing is of upmost importance to us – particularly in an age when most online content is free to consume. (It's worth noting that while SheRa Mag angles itself towards women, our contributors consist of both men and women.) Secondly, to achieve our goal of widening the conversation on women’s issues, introducing readers to interesting women and generally empowering girls and women around the world, we need to set aside a budget to pursue and investigate stories. This includes attending relevant events and festivals, conducting face-to-face interviews, and shooting fashion editorials with women of all shapes and sizes and ethnicities.

We also need to inject funding into our marketing campaign in order to reach our intended target audience. As we endeavour to reach a truly global audience, to penetrate our target audience, and to get the very urgent message of gender equality out there, we need to conduct specific and sometimes radical campaigns – from producing controversial social media messages, to raising awareness in universities and other institutions, to launching multi-media campaigns for the web and TV, to running competitions. 

The goal is that through advertising and affiliate programmes, SheRa Mag generates enough income to pay its own way and keep the quality content flowin'. 

If we don't reach our entire goal, we will still divvy up the funds we raise, dedicating approximately 50% to marketing and 50% to editorial. 

What you'll get from us...

We have a plethora of delicious perks, from spunky t-shirts and keyrings, to owning your very own copy of the SheRa Mag Year Book, to having a Skype convo or a lunch with us in person, to advertising your business on our website, to the chance of being a guest editor and helping us curate an issue. 

Any donation, however big or small, counts, but even if you are unable to donate, please do help us spread the word and build the SheRa Mag community. Send this page to your family, friends, colleagues, and anyone in your life who cares about gender equality. With your help, we can make SheRa Mag the go-to publication for the girl of today and the pioneer of tomorrow. #GenderEquality2015

www.sheramag.com
